programme.title: The Bridge
programme.desc: A body is left on the border of Singapore and Malaysia. Two investigators, one from each country, must work together to catch a killer bent on highlighting social problems that they think are plaguing people on both sides of the border.

programme.title: World Sailing Show 2025
programme.desc: The World Sailing Show is the official international sailing series of the sailing federation World Sailing and is a monthly digest of everything that matters in the sport. From Olympic sailing to the round the world races and the America's Cup, the show includes personality profiles of the top players and technical features from the cutting edge of the sport where the access provided behind the scenes at major events is unparalleled.

programme.title: Crime Scene Kitchen S2
programme.desc: Each episode of this cooking competition begins at the scene of the crime -- a kitchen that was just used to make an amazing, mouthwatering dessert that has since disappeared. To take the $100,000 prize, the competing dessert makers will need to prove they have the technical know-how, imagination and problem-solving skills needed to decode and re-create incredible desserts and cakes from across the world.

programme.title: World's Wildest Weather S2
programme.desc: From freak tornadoes appearing out of nowhere, to pounding storms with hailstones the size of footballs... this fast-paced, adrenaline-filled, and shocking documentary series charts some of the most extreme weather from around the globe. Mixing first-person witness statements, expert commentary, user-generated content, CGI and science, it's a memorable examination of some of the wildest weather systems ever seen.

programme.desc: Contestants compete against a professional quizzer, known as the Chaser, whose aim is to prevent the contestants from winning a cash prize. Hosted by Sara Haines.

programme.title: Hiccup And Sneeze S2
programme.desc: After realising that Bibi doesn't have a tail like they do, Hiccup and Sneeze decide to make her one - just so they'll know exactly how she's feeling just by looking at it!

programme.title: Hoppy & Friends
programme.desc: Hoppy and Friends is a Pre-school series featuring Hoppy, the Rabbit, Leo the Lion and Panny the Panda. Every episode, they embark on an adventure through stories. Join them on a fantastic journey and explore the wonderful world around them through song, dance.

programme.title: Hiccup & Sneeze
programme.desc: Sneeze wants to play, but Hiccup prefers to read instead. So he ropes Bibi in to help him make a baby monster doll to play with! When Hiccup sees the doll, she wants to play with it too. However, Sneeze is a little reluctant to let her.

programme.title: Zoo TV
programme.desc: The serious showcases Singapore Zoo and it's animals, with each episode focusing on a specific genre ie: predators. The series looks at the different species of predators in the zoo, shares interesting information about specific animals and highlights endangered species.

programme.title: Cosmicrew S1
programme.desc: Meet the cosmic rangers - courageous team leader Storm the tiger, fun-loving man of action Flash the monkey and science genius Rainbow the rabbit! From the Cosmicrew Base - their headquarters on Earth - the cosmic rangers launch into mission after mission, helping animals across the globe using not only their high-tech Cosmicrew gear, but also their own strength, courage and smarts. Every exciting encounter helps Storm, Flash and Rainbow discover the amazing abilities each animal possesses.

programme.title: Crimewatch 2025

programme.title: News Tonight
programme.desc: (Live) The daily evening-news programme featuring highlights and coverage of both local and international news with a local perspective.

programme.title: Earth
programme.desc: This revealing biography of Earth explores the planet's most epic moments. From the first raindrops that turned it into a water world to the arrival of its most incredible inhabitants, us. But humans take a back seat in this narrative. Instead, Earth is placed centre stage. We see what happened to our world before we even crawled from the mud - including massive bombardments from space, extreme changes in climate and the collision of whole continents.

programme.title: Dinosaur Apocalypse
programme.desc: This landmark documentary brings to life, in unprecedented detail, the lost world of the very last days of the dinosaurs.Searching in the hills of North Dakota, palaeontologist Robert DePalma discovered fossilised creatures, buried in a mysterious crumbly layer of rock. They were astonishingly well preserved, like the bodies found at Pompeii.

programme.desc: 七十年代英军撤离新加坡，店屋贱价出售。心娘看准时机买店屋投资，庆叔和阿燕倾尽积蓄支持。耀鹏已5岁，被安娜故意娇纵成小霸王。心娘看穿安娜居心，但无力改变。耀光、耀亮加入家族企业，耀光提议将业务移往国外。白阿力五年间成为新老大，为报祖业恩情，撮合他与心娘。不料，心娘问白阿力是否愿意娶她，令他措手不及。.

programme.title: 三把刀
programme.desc: 《三把刀》烹饪擂台赛开战至今，已有两位挑战者成功夺得两把刀。这一集，节目迎来几位在饮食业驰骋多年的挑战者。他们表现如何，是否夺刀在望？不要错过《三把刀》！.

programme.title: 黄金年华之斗歌竞艺
programme.desc: 年过半百的乐龄人士在奉献多年后，终于迎来了人生的新篇章。那些藏在心底的梦想，将再次点亮舞台！《黄金年华》除了是一场歌艺竞赛，更是难得的学习与交友之旅。不仅能拜师学艺，也能交到志同道合的朋友。新系列的节目将延续团战的形式，为乐龄朋友们提供一个更多元、有趣的荣誉舞台，让大家拥有同样的机会，携手走到最后。.

programme.title: 千年陕菜 (第二季)
programme.desc: 《千年陕菜》围绕“陕菜有哪些”这一主题展开，陕北、关中、陕南等地的美食悉数登场，从古都深宫中传下的珍馐，到市井街角里刷屏的小吃，流转千年的味道从不被尊卑观念所束缚，只因它们同样有着绵长的历史。美食表面的热烈背后，是一类食材、一门技艺、一段历史、一脉血缘的集体作用。行走三秦大地，围坐民间老席，在烟火生活中呈现陕菜饮食文化的历史长卷和陕西人的生活长卷。.

programme.title: 新村之后 第二季
programme.desc: 《新村之后》将带领观众走过各个新村，看见不同的风景面貌。陈泽耀踏上这趟新村之旅，从繁忙的城市走进新村人的生活，由南马至北马，细尝传统时光，慢品人生百味，也在缓慢的生活中，重新找回人与人相连的质朴情感，发现新村之美。.

programme.title: 四川非遗 100
programme.desc: 《四川非遗100》生动细节地诠释了非遗物品的制作工艺和物品特色，展示四川非遗项目、非遗传承人守正创新的新生故事。通过20个四川的非遗项目，展示了时代潮流下，匠人们的坚守和推陈出新。全片分为：藏羌毓秀、知竹长乐、古街伞匠、淬火铸砂、百年龚扇、湛蓝于心、何以为漆、银丝入画、清流知味、年的纹路 等等。.
